summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plats 11W and 11E, Page 20 and 21 of Exhibit E-2 to the Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance (86300), pages 24-272 and 24-273 of the Seattle Municipal Code to change the environmental classification of certain property located Salmon Bay Waterway southwest of Shilshole Avenue Northwest between 17th and 24th Avenues Northwest, as extended, from Conservancy Natural (CN) to Urban Development (UD). (Petition of Robert R. Hintz; C.F. 290265).
